author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Scottsdale, AZ would like information that identifies the previous place of employment for municipal workers, as well as where they usually go for employment once they leave a municipality.  For example, Do most municipal workers, go from municipality to municipality?  Or, do they leave the private or non-profit sector and go to work for municipalities; and/or vice versa?  
Please forward whatever information you may have, or if you know of any related studies, reports, etc., re: where local government employees “come from” and/or where do they go when they leave.    
Thank you!   
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Local Government Employee - where do they come from or go to?
